allow: Bash(# Check if Android Studio has a bundled gradle ls ""C:/Program Files/Android/"" ; ls ""C:/Users/shira/AppData/Local/Android/"" ; ls ""C:/Users/shira/.gradle/wrapper/dists/"")
Bash(# Check for Gradle wrapper jars cached by Android Studio find ""C:/Users/shira/.gradle/wrapper/dists/"" -name ""gradle-wrapper.jar"")
Bash(# Look for any gradle executable in Android Studio''s installation find ""C:/Program Files/Android/Android Studio/"" -name ""gradle.bat"" -o -name ""gradle.exe"")
Bash(# First, let''s find Room''s generated schema hash from the build find ""C:/Users/shira/PractS/tcf-practice-tracker/tcf-practice-tracker-android/app/build"" -name ""*.json"" -path ""*schemas*"")
